IntelEnvironmentMetrics.description: This version is added to represent the Oem properties for a EnvironmentMetrics resource.
IntelEnvironmentMetrics.longDescription: This version is added to represent the Oem properties for a EnvironmentMetrics resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

PowerWatts.longDescription: This property shall contain the total power, in watt units, for this resource. The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Power`.

TemperatureCelsius.longDescription: This property shall contain the temperature, in degrees Celsius units, for this resource. The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Temperature`.

title: #IntelEnvironmentMetrics.v1_0_0
